title: Airline ancillary fee receipts (baggage, seat selection)
dataVerified: Passenger name, flight, ancillary service, fee amount, payment confirmation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered ancillary fee receipts. Domain binding verifies airline. Expense claim verification. Prevents fee dispute fraud. Baggage fee, seat fee, wifi fee documentation.
